configFile.description: Specify the config file location to be used by `stylelint`.

context.description: A `String` indicating the root of your `SCSS` files.

emitErrors.description: If true, pipes `stylelint` error severity messages to the `webpack` compiler's error message handler.

failOnError.description: If true, throws a fatal error in the global build process. This will end the build process on any `stylelint` error.

files.description: Specify the glob pattern for finding files. Must be relative to `options.context`.

formatter.description: Specify a custom formatter to format errors printed to the console.

lintDirtyModulesOnly.description: Lint only changed files, skip lint on start.

syntax.description: See the `styelint` [user guide](https://stylelint.io/user-guide/node-api/#syntax) for more info. e.g. use `'scss'` to lint .scss files.
